attributes.action: Standardise UK Crisp Packet Colours Prior To Leaving The EEU
attributes.additional_details: It is proposed that all manufacturers adopt a standard colour to flavour code so that customers will know exactly what flavour they are buying at a glance.
attributes.background: As there is no standardisation across the different manufacturers of crisps with packet colour  and flavour representation with Cheese & Onion and the Salt & Vinegar flavours being the worst offenders with many brands using blue & green for the packaging leading to people grabbing the wrong flavour.

rejection.details: You might like to write to crisp manufacturers to make this suggestion.
